title: In Conversation: Inside the secret prisons where migrants are tortured and beaten
itunes:title: In Conversation: Inside the secret prisons where migrants are tortured and beaten
description: For the New Yorker, journalist Ian Urbina traveled to Libya to report on an EU-funded shadow immigration system that holds migrants in brutal detention centers. While reporting this story, Urbina was kidnapped, beaten, and detained himself. Now safely back home, he spoke with Apple News Today host Shumita Basu about how this shadow system works and the horrific conditions inside the detention centers.
